metadata.titleEn: Surface oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (2017-2022)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原地表氧含量数据（2017-2022）
metadata.description: This dataset includes both measured and simulated surface oxygen concentration data on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. Among them, the measured data were based on field measurements, including the oxygen concentration data of 807 measurement points on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau from 2017 to 2022 and the corresponding geographical environment data such as latitude, longitude, elevation, temperature, relative humidity, air pressure, FVC, geomorphologic type, and vegetation type. The simulated data were based on model simulations, including the annual average, July average, January average oxygen concentration distribution data, and the difference between the July average and January average, with the spatial resolution of 1 km × 1 km and the unit of data in %. Through cross-validation analysis, the surface oxygen concentration simulation model of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau is robust and the accuracy of the simulation data is high. This dataset filled the gaps in the measurement and research of oxygen concentrations on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, while providing data support for analyses of the influencing factors and spatiotemporal characteristics of oxygen concentrations, which is of great significance for promoting the construction of ecological civilization in the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau region.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包括青藏高原地表氧含量实测数据和模拟数据。其中，青藏高原地表氧含量实测数据基于野外实地测量获得，包括于2017年至2022年间在青藏高原获取的807个测量点的氧含量数据和相应的经纬度、海拔、气温、相对湿度、气压、植被覆盖度、地貌类型、植被类型等地理环境数据。青藏高原地表氧含量模拟数据基于模型模拟获得，包括青藏高原年均氧含量分布数据、青藏高原1月平均氧含量分布数据、青藏高原7月平均氧含量分布数据以及青藏高原7月与1月氧含量差值数据，数据的空间分辨率为1 km × 1 km，数据的单位为%。通过交叉验证分析，青藏高原地表氧含量模拟模型相对稳健，模拟数据精度较高。本数据集填补了青藏高原氧含量数据测量和研究空白，为青藏高原地表氧含量影响因素分析和时空特征研究提供了数据支撑，对于促进青藏高原地区生态文明建设具有重要意义。
metadata.instructions:
"The measured surface oxygen concentration data was named ""Surface oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (2017-2022).xlsx"", and the file was stored in xlsx format, which can be opened by Excel and other software. 
The simulated surface oxygen concentration data include: annual average oxygen concentration distribution data on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (File ""Annual average oxygen concentration.tif""), January average oxygen concentration distribution data on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (File ""January average oxygen concentration.tif""), July average oxygen concentration distribution data on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (File ""July average oxygen concentration.tif"") and Distribution data of the difference between the July average and January average (File "" Difference between July and January.tif ""). The data were stored in GeoTIFF format with a spatial resolution of 1 km × 1 km. The spatial resolution of the data was 1 km × 1 km, the geographic coordinate system of the data was WGS 1984 and the unit of the data was %. The simulated data can be opened by ArcGIS and other software."
metadata.instructionsCn: 青藏高原地表氧含量实测数据名称为“Surface oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau (2017-2022).xlsx”，文件以xlsx格式存储，可用Excel等软件打开。青藏高原地表氧含量模拟数据包括：青藏高原年平均氧含量分布数据（文件名称为“Annual average oxygen concentration.tif”）、青藏高原1月平均氧含量分布数据（文件名称为“January average oxygen concentration.tif”）、青藏高原7月平均氧含量分布数据（文件名称为“July average oxygen concentration.tif”）、青藏高原7月与1月氧含量差值分布数据（文件名称为“Difference between July and January.tif”），文件以GeoTIFF格式存储，数据的空间分辨率为1 km × 1 km，数据的地理坐标系为WGS 1984，数据的单位为%，可用ArcGIS等软件打开。

literatureList.referenceEn: Chen, Y.Q., Zhang, G.F., Chen, Z.Y., Yang, X.M., Chen, B., Ma, Y.G., Xie, H.C., Luo, Q.Y.,  Yang, J., Ye, T., Yu, D.Y., Wang, J.A., Tang, H.P., Chen, Z., & Shi, P.J. literatureList.titleEn: Factors contributing to spatial-temporal variations of observed oxygen concentration over the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau.
literatureList.referenceEn: Shi, P.J., Chen, Y.Q., Zhang, G.F., Tang, H.P., Chen, Z., Yu, D.Y., Yang, J., Ye, T., Wang, J.A.,  Liang, S.L., Ma, Y.G., Wu, J.D., & Gong, P. (2021). Factors contributing to spatial-temporal variations of observed oxygen concentration over the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau. Scientific Reports, 11, 17338.

relatedDataList.titleEn: Qilian Mountains integrated observatory network: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network (eddy covariance system of desert station, 2018)

background: Oxygen (O2) is the most abundant molecule in the atmosphere after nitrogen. Previous studies have documented that oxygen concentration remains nearly constant (20.946%) at all altitudes. The Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau lies between 26°00′ –39°47′N, 73°19′–104°47′E, covers an area of ~ 2.5 × 106 km2, with an average altitude exceeding 4500 m. Also known as the “Roof of the World”, the climate on the QTP is characterized by a typical cold and dry alpine climate, with an average annual temperature from −3.1 to 4.4 °C and an average annual precipitation from 103 to 694 mm, which both decreases from east to west. One of the key features that enable our planet Earth to house an active and diverse biology is the presence of free molecular oxygen (O2) in the atmosphere. In the long history of Geological time scale, near-surface oxygen concentration has changed drastically and induced critical impacts on the biogeochemical processes of the earth surface, and the evolution of life. However, for the past century, oxygen concentration has been regarded as nearly constant since the first result presented by Benedict (1912). Machta and Hughes collected observations of atmospheric oxygen between 50°N and 60°S, mainly over the oceans, and suggested an almost constant O2 value of 20.946% by volume in dry air. Studies further suggest that oxygen concentration remains nearly constant, with little variations at different altitudes and within different seasons.
research objective: Here, for the first time, we systematically investigate the spatial–temporal variation of near-surface oxygen concentration and quantify the relative contributions of altitude, temperature, and vegetation to it.
methods: We conduct field observations on the QTP and its vicinities and collect 487 samples, with altitude varied from 645 to 5238 m above sea level. On each site, information collected included location, altitude, oxygen concentration, barometric pressure and air temperature. As the control group, a fixed-site continuous observation is conducted in Fangshan, Beijing with an altitude of 33 m.
findings: Here we show for the first time that oxygen concentration varies significantly from earlier consensus and shows strong spatial and seasonal differences. Field observations on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau (QTP) indicate oxygen concentration of 19.94–20.66% (2018, n = 80), 19.98–20.78% (2019, n = 166) and 19.97–20.73% (2020, n = 176), all statistically different from earlier reports (p < 0.001) and are lower than the nearly constant. The mean oxygen concentration in summer (20.47%) is 0.31% higher than that of winter (20.16%) (n = 53) at identical locations in 2019, sampled in the Qilian Mountains, northwest QTP. We used LMG (The Lindeman, Merenda and Gold) method to estimate the relative contributions of altitude, air temperature and vegetation index (Fractional Vegetation Cover, FVC and Leaf Area Index, LAI) to oxygen concentration, which are 47%, 32% and 3% (FVC, R2 = 82%); 45%, 30% and 7% (LAI, R2 = 82%), respectively.
backgroundCn: 氧气（O2）是大气中除氮气外最丰富的分子。先前的研究表明，氧气浓度在所有高度上几乎保持不变（20.946%）。青藏高原位于26°00′ –39°47′N，73°19′–104°47′E，覆盖面积约为2.5 × 10^6 km²，平均海拔超过4500米。青藏高原也被称为“世界屋脊”，其气候特征为典型的寒冷干燥的高山气候，年平均气温从−3.1到4.4 °C，年平均降水量从103到694毫米，且均自东向西递减。使地球能够容纳活跃而多样的生物的一个关键特征是大气中存在游离分子氧（O2）。在漫长的地质时间尺度中，近地表氧气浓度发生了剧烈变化，并对地球表面的生物地球化学过程和生命的演化产生了重要影响。然而，在过去的一个世纪里，自从Benedict（1912）首次提出结果以来，氧气浓度被认为几乎保持不变。Machta和Hughes收集了50°N到60°S之间的气象观测，主要是在海洋上，建议干燥空气中氧气的体积浓度几乎保持在20.946%。进一步的研究表明，氧气浓度在不同高度和不同季节之间几乎保持不变，变化很小。
research objectiveCn: 在这里，我们首次系统地研究了近地表氧气浓度的时空变化，并量化了海拔、温度和植被对其的相对贡献。
methodsCn: 我们在青藏高原及其周边地区进行实地观察，收集了487个样本，海拔高度从645米到5238米不等。在每个地点收集的信息包括位置、海拔、氧气浓度、气压和气温。作为对照组，在北京房山进行了一项固定地点的连续观察，海拔为33米。
findingsCn: 我们首次显示氧气浓度与早期共识存在显著差异，并且具有强烈的空间和季节性差异。青藏高原（QTP）的实地观察表明，2018年氧气浓度为19.94–20.66%（n = 80），2019年为19.98–20.78%（n = 166），2020年为19.97–20.73%（n = 176），这些数据均与早期报告存在统计学差异（p < 0.001），且低于几乎恒定的值。2019年在相同地点采样的夏季平均氧气浓度（20.47%）比冬季（20.16%）高0.31%（n = 53），采样地点位于西北QTP的祁连山。我们使用LMG（Lindeman, Merenda和Gold）方法估计海拔、气温和植被指数（植被覆盖度Fractional Vegetation Cover, FVC和叶面积指数Leaf Area Index, LAI）对氧气浓度的相对贡献，结果分别为47%、32%和3%（FVC, R2 = 82%）；45%、30%和7%（LAI, R2 = 82%）。

Verification.QuestionEn: Are field observations on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and its vicinities used as a data collection method in this domain?
Verification.QuestionCn: 青藏高原及其周边地区的实地观察是否被用作该领域的数据收集方法？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is there a focus on understanding the spatial-temporal variation of near-surface oxygen concentration within the field?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在该领域是否关注近地表氧浓度的时空变化理解？

Verification.QuestionEn: Do data collection methods consider the relative contributions of altitude, temperature, and vegetation to oxygen concentration?
Verification.QuestionCn: 数据收集方法是否考虑了海拔、温度和植被对氧气浓度的相对贡献？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: For spatial and temporal analysis of oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau, is continuous observation at a fixed site or sampling from multiple locations more common?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 对于青藏高原氧气浓度的空间和时间分析，固定地点的连续观测还是多个地点的取样更为常见？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data collection methods are used to gather surface oxygen concentration data on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原上收集表面氧气浓度数据的方法有哪些？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to measure oxygen concentration at various altitudes on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量青藏高原不同高度氧气浓度的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: Field observations on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau (QTP) and its vicinities were conducted, collecting 487 samples at altitudes ranging from 645 to 5238 m above sea level. Information collected at each site included location, altitude, oxygen concentration, barometric pressure, and air temperature.
Example.AnswerCn: 在青藏高原及其周边地区进行了实地观察，收集了487个样本，海拔范围从645米到5238米。每个采样点收集的信息包括位置、海拔、氧气浓度、气压和气温。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a model used to simulate oxygen concentration distribution across the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Example.QuestionCn: 一个用于模拟青藏高原氧气浓度分布的模型的例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: The Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau surface oxygen concentration simulation model provides annual average oxygen concentration distribution data, as well as January and July average oxygen concentration distribution data. The spatial resolution of these data is 1 km × 1 km.
Example.AnswerCn: 青藏高原表面氧气浓度模拟模型提供了年平均氧气浓度分布数据，以及1月和7月的平均氧气浓度分布数据。这些数据的空间分辨率为1 km × 1 km。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the data collection methods used for measuring surface oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于测量青藏高原表面氧浓度的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: field observations, 807 measurement points, oxygen concentration, location, altitude, temperature, relative humidity, air pressure, vegetation cover, landform type, vegetation type
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 现场观测，807个测量点，氧气浓度，位置，海拔，温度，相对湿度，气压，植被覆盖，地形类型，植被类型

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific features are included in the simulated oxygen concentration data for the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 青藏高原模拟氧浓度数据包含哪些具体特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: annual average oxygen concentration distribution, January average oxygen concentration distribution, July average oxygen concentration distribution, difference in oxygen concentration between July and January, spatial resolution of 1 km × 1 km, measured in percentage
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 年平均氧气浓度分布，1月平均氧气浓度分布，7月平均氧气浓度分布，7月与1月氧气浓度差异，空间分辨率为1公里×1公里，以百分比为单位测量。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What factors are quantified to assess their impact on near-surface oxygen concentration in the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 评估青藏高原近地表氧浓度影响的因素有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: altitude, temperature, vegetation, 47% for altitude, 32% for temperature, 3% or 7% for vegetation indices, R2 value of 82%
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 海拔、温度、植被，海拔占47%，温度占32%，植被指数占3%或7%，R²值为82%。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many measurement points are included in a dataset about near-surface oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau between 2017 and 2022?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 关于2017年至2022年青藏高原近地表氧气浓度的数据集中包含多少个测量点？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of the simulated oxygen concentration data for the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 青藏高原模拟氧浓度数据的空间分辨率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'field observations' in the context of collecting data on near-surface oxygen concentration?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在收集近地表氧气浓度数据的背景下，“现场观察”指的是在自然环境中直接进行的观察和测量。这通常涉及到在特定地点使用仪器或设备来记录氧气浓度的变化，以获取真实的、即时的数据。
Definition.AnswerEn: Field observations refer to the process of collecting data directly from various locations within the study area. In this context, it involves gathering information such as location, altitude, oxygen concentration, barometric pressure, and air temperature at each site on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and its vicinities.
Definition.AnswerCn: 实地观察是指直接从研究区域内的各个地点收集数据的过程。在这个背景下，它涉及在青藏高原及其周边地区的每个地点收集信息，如位置、海拔、氧气浓度、气压和空气温度。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is 'model simulation' utilized in generating data for surface oxygen concentration studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: “模型模拟”在生成表面氧浓度研究的数据中是如何被利用的？
Definition.AnswerEn: Model simulation in this context involves using computational models to predict and generate data on the distribution of oxygen concentration across the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau. It includes simulating annual mean oxygen concentration, monthly averages for January and July, and the differences between these months, with a spatial resolution of 1 km × 1 km.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在这个背景下，模型模拟涉及使用计算模型来预测和生成青藏高原氧气浓度分布的数据。它包括模拟年均氧气浓度、1月和7月的月平均值，以及这两个月之间的差异，空间分辨率为1 km × 1 km。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'cross-validation analysis' mean in the context of assessing the reliability of a simulated dataset?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在评估模拟数据集的可靠性时，“交叉验证分析”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Cross-validation analysis is a method used to evaluate the accuracy and reliability of a simulated dataset by comparing it against observed data. It helps determine the robustness of the simulation model and ensures that the generated data closely represents real-world conditions on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau.
Definition.AnswerCn: 交叉验证分析是一种评估模拟数据集准确性和可靠性的方法，通过与观察数据进行比较。它有助于确定模拟模型的稳健性，并确保生成的数据与青藏高原的真实世界条件密切相关。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do field measurements of oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau compare to model-simulated oxygen concentration data in terms of spatial resolution and temporal coverage?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 青藏高原的氧气浓度现场测量与模型模拟的氧气浓度数据在空间分辨率和时间覆盖方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Field measurements on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau provide data from 807 measurement points with specific geographic and environmental parameters collected between 2017 and 2022. These data points include measured oxygen concentration along with location, altitude, and other local conditions. In contrast, model-simulated data offer annual and monthly average oxygen concentration distributions for January and July, with a spatial resolution of 1 km × 1 km, providing broader spatial coverage but potentially less granularity in temporal changes compared to continuous field observations.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 青藏高原的实地测量提供了807个测量点的数据，这些数据收集了2017年至2022年间的特定地理和环境参数。这些数据点包括氧气浓度的测量，以及位置、高度和其他当地条件。相比之下，模型模拟数据提供了1月和7月的年均和月均氧气浓度分布，空间分辨率为1 km × 1 km，提供了更广泛的空间覆盖，但在时间变化的细节上可能不如连续的实地观察。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the contributions of altitude, temperature, and vegetation to oxygen concentration variations on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau compare to their expected impacts based on previous studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 青藏高原上，海拔、温度和植被对氧气浓度变化的贡献与之前研究中预期的影响相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The contributions of altitude, air temperature, and vegetation to oxygen concentration variations on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau are quantitatively estimated using the LMG method, showing significant impacts: altitude accounts for 47% to 45% of variations, air temperature for 32% to 30%, and vegetation indices (FVC and LAI) for 3% to 7%. These findings demonstrate stronger spatial and seasonal variability than previously assumed constant oxygen levels, highlighting the importance of environmental factors on oxygen concentration in high-altitude regions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 利用LMG方法定量估计了海拔、气温和植被对青藏高原氧气浓度变化的贡献，结果显示显著影响：海拔占变化的47%至45%，气温占32%至30%，植被指数（FVC和LAI）占3%至7%。这些发现表明，氧气浓度的空间和季节变异性比之前假设的恒定氧气水平更强，突显了环境因素在高海拔地区氧气浓度中的重要性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the observed spatial and seasonal variations in near-surface oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响青藏高原近地表氧气浓度的空间和季节变化的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The spatial and seasonal variations in near-surface oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau are found to be significantly different from earlier consensus. Field observations indicate that oxygen concentration varies from 19.94% to 20.78% across different years, with summer concentrations being higher than winter. These variations are attributed to altitude, air temperature, and vegetation indices like Fractional Vegetation Cover and Leaf Area Index, with their relative contributions estimated using the LMG method.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 青藏高原近地表氧气浓度的空间和季节变化与早期共识显著不同。实地观察表明，不同年份的氧气浓度在19.94%到20.78%之间变化，夏季浓度高于冬季。这些变化归因于海拔、气温以及植被指数，如植被覆盖度和叶面积指数，利用LMG方法估计了它们的相对贡献。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes have led researchers to question the longstanding assumption of constant atmospheric oxygen concentration?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 哪些原因导致研究人员质疑大气氧气浓度恒定的长期假设？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Researchers have questioned the longstanding assumption of constant atmospheric oxygen concentration because recent studies, including those conducted on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau, have shown that oxygen levels exhibit significant spatial and temporal variations. These findings challenge the historical view that oxygen concentration is constant at all altitudes and seasons, highlighting the influence of factors such as altitude, air temperature, and vegetation, which were not fully considered in earlier studies.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 研究人员质疑了长期以来对大气氧气浓度恒定的假设，因为最近的研究，包括在青藏高原进行的研究，显示氧气水平存在显著的空间和时间变化。这些发现挑战了历史上认为氧气浓度在所有高度和季节都是恒定的观点，突显了高度、空气温度和植被等因素的影响，而这些因素在早期研究中并未得到充分考虑。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the impact on data accuracy when using both field measurements and model simulations for assessing surface oxygen concentrations on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在评估青藏高原表面氧气浓度时，使用现场测量和模型模拟对数据准确性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The combined use of field measurements and model simulations provides a robust approach to assessing surface oxygen concentrations, offering high precision and filling measurement gaps, as indicated by the cross-validation analysis showing that the simulation model is relatively robust with high accuracy.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 现场测量与模型模拟的结合使用提供了一种稳健的方法来评估表面氧浓度，具有高精度并填补了测量空白。交叉验证分析表明，模拟模型相对稳健，准确性较高。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the integration of altitude, temperature, and vegetation data influence the understanding of spatial-temporal variations in oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 海拔、温度和植被数据的整合如何影响对青藏高原氧气浓度时空变化的理解？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The integration of altitude, temperature, and vegetation data significantly enhances the understanding of spatial-temporal variations in oxygen concentration, with altitude contributing up to 47%, temperature 32%, and vegetation indices like FVC and LAI adding smaller but notable influences, leading to a comprehensive understanding of oxygen variation patterns.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 海拔、温度和植被数据的整合显著增强了对氧气浓度时空变化的理解，其中海拔贡献了高达47%，温度贡献32%，而植被指数如FVC和LAI则提供了较小但显著的影响，从而形成了对氧气变化模式的全面理解。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of discrepancies between historical assumptions of constant oxygen levels and the observed variations in oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 历史上对恒定氧气水平的假设与青藏高原观察到的氧气浓度变化之间的差异可能带来的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The observed variations challenge historical assumptions of constant oxygen levels, revealing significant spatial and seasonal differences which could impact the understanding of biogeochemical processes and ecological dynamics in high-altitude regions, suggesting a need to reassess models and predictions concerning atmospheric and ecological interactions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 观察到的变化挑战了历史上对氧气水平恒定的假设，揭示了显著的空间和季节差异，这可能影响对高海拔地区生物地球化学过程和生态动态的理解，暗示需要重新评估关于大气和生态相互作用的模型和预测。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting both field measured and model simulated surface oxygen concentration data for the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集青藏高原的实地测量和模型模拟表面氧气浓度数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives of collecting both field measured and model simulated surface oxygen concentration data for the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau include filling the data gaps in oxygen concentration measurements, supporting analyses of influencing factors and spatiotemporal characteristics, and contributing to ecological and environmental studies in the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集青藏高原的现场测量和模型模拟表面氧气浓度数据的主要目标包括填补氧气浓度测量的数据空白，支持影响因素和时空特征的分析，以及为该地区的生态和环境研究做出贡献。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended outcomes of quantifying the relative contributions of altitude, temperature, and vegetation to oxygen concentration variations?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 量化海拔、温度和植被对氧气浓度变化的相对贡献的预期结果是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended outcomes of quantifying the relative contributions of altitude, temperature, and vegetation to oxygen concentration variations include providing insights into the factors influencing oxygen levels, enhancing the understanding of environmental dynamics, and offering data to inform ecological management and policy-making in high-altitude regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 量化海拔、温度和植被对氧气浓度变化的相对贡献的预期结果包括提供影响氧气水平的因素的见解，增强对环境动态的理解，以及提供数据以指导高海拔地区的生态管理和政策制定。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed in collecting and measuring surface oxygen concentration data across different altitudes and geographical conditions on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原不同海拔和地理条件下，收集和测量表面氧气浓度数据所采用的方法论有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Field observations are conducted on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and its vicinities, collecting samples with altitude variations from 645 to 5238 m above sea level. Information collected at each site includes location, altitude, oxygen concentration, barometric pressure, and air temperature.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在青藏高原及其周边地区进行实地观察，收集海拔从645米到5238米的样本。每个地点收集的信息包括位置、海拔、氧气浓度、气压和气温。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are simulation models used to predict annual and seasonal variations in oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 模拟模型如何用于预测青藏高原氧气浓度的年度和季节变化？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The simulation models generate data of annual average oxygen concentration distribution, January and July average oxygen concentration distribution, and the difference between July and January oxygen concentration. These models are cross-validated for robustness, providing high-precision simulated data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 模拟模型生成年度平均氧气浓度分布、1月和7月的平均氧气浓度分布，以及7月和1月氧气浓度之间的差异。这些模型经过交叉验证以确保稳健性，提供高精度的模拟数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: In what ways can the relative contributions of environmental factors to oxygen concentration be quantified in this region?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在这个地区，如何量化环境因素对氧气浓度的相对贡献？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The LMG (The Lindeman, Merenda and Gold) method is used to estimate the relative contributions of altitude, air temperature, and vegetation index (Fractional Vegetation Cover, FVC, and Leaf Area Index, LAI) to oxygen concentration, showing significant contributions from these factors.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: LMG（Lindeman、Merenda和Gold方法）用于估计海拔、空气温度和植被指数（植被覆盖度Fractional Vegetation Cover，FVC，以及叶面积指数Leaf Area Index，LAI）对氧气浓度的相对贡献，显示出这些因素的显著贡献。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What techniques enable the accurate collection of oxygen concentration data at different altitudes on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术能够在青藏高原的不同高度上准确收集氧气浓度数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Field observations are conducted on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and its vicinities, collecting samples at altitudes from 645 to 5238 meters above sea level. Each site records information such as location, altitude, oxygen concentration, barometric pressure, and air temperature.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在青藏高原及其周边地区进行实地观察，采集海拔从645米到5238米的样本。每个地点记录的信息包括位置、海拔、氧气浓度、气压和气温。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the use of environmental variables like temperature and vegetation indices enable the analysis of oxygen concentration variations?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 环境变量如温度和植被指数的使用如何使氧气浓度变化的分析成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The analysis involves using methods like the Lindeman, Merenda, and Gold (LMG) method to estimate the relative contributions of altitude, air temperature, and vegetation indices (Fractional Vegetation Cover and Leaf Area Index) to oxygen concentration, providing insights into how these factors influence oxygen levels.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 该分析涉及使用林德曼、梅伦达和戈德（LMG）方法来估计海拔、空气温度和植被指数（植被覆盖度和叶面积指数）对氧气浓度的相对贡献，从而提供这些因素如何影响氧气水平的见解。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges could be anticipated in collecting accurate near-surface oxygen concentration data across the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau, given its high-altitude environment?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原的高海拔环境中，收集准确的近地表氧气浓度数据可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in collecting accurate data could include dealing with the harsh and variable climatic conditions, such as low temperatures and high winds, which may affect equipment performance and accessibility to remote locations. Additionally, the vast area and difficult terrain could make consistent and comprehensive sampling across all necessary locations logistically challenging.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 收集准确数据的挑战可能包括应对恶劣和多变的气候条件，例如低温和强风，这可能会影响设备性能和到达偏远地区的可达性。此外，广阔的区域和困难的地形可能使在所有必要地点进行一致和全面的采样在后勤上具有挑战性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might existing models need adjustment or refinement when simulating oxygen concentration data for the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 现有模型在模拟青藏高原的氧气浓度数据时，可能需要调整或改进的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Existing models might need adjustment because the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau's specific altitude, temperature, and vegetation characteristics could influence oxygen concentration in ways not previously considered. The field observations suggest significant spatial and seasonal differences in oxygen levels, indicating that traditional assumptions and parameters used in models may not fully capture the complexity of this region's environmental interactions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 现有模型可能需要调整，因为青藏高原特定的海拔、温度和植被特征可能以未曾考虑的方式影响氧气浓度。实地观察表明，氧气水平存在显著的空间和季节差异，这表明传统假设和模型中使用的参数可能无法充分捕捉该地区环境相互作用的复杂性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the implications of relying on field observations and simulation models for assessing oxygen concentration on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 依赖实地观察和模拟模型评估青藏高原氧气浓度的影响是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of both field observations and simulation models allows for a comprehensive understanding of oxygen concentration variations on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau. Field observations provide direct measurements, while simulation models offer spatial and temporal coverage. The combination can address measurement gaps and ensure robust data for analyzing influencing factors like altitude, temperature, and vegetation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 现场观察和模拟模型的结合使我们能够全面理解青藏高原氧气浓度的变化。现场观察提供了直接的测量数据，而模拟模型则提供了空间和时间的覆盖。两者的结合可以填补测量空白，确保在分析影响因素如海拔、温度和植被时数据的可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how researchers can accurately measure near-surface oxygen concentration given the myriad of environmental variables on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解研究人员如何能够准确测量青藏高原近地表氧气浓度，因为环境变量众多。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Accurate measurement involves collecting a variety of data points, including altitude, oxygen concentration, barometric pressure, and air temperature, across multiple sites. This comprehensive data collection allows for analysis of the relative contributions of these variables to oxygen concentration.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 准确的测量涉及收集多种数据点，包括多个地点的海拔、氧气浓度、气压和空气温度。这种全面的数据收集可以分析这些变量对氧气浓度的相对贡献。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the data collection methods used for measuring surface oxygen concentrations in high-altitude regions, including any environmental variables recorded alongside.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述用于测量高海拔地区表面氧气浓度的数据收集方法，包括同时记录的任何环境变量。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Field observations were conducted on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and its vicinities, where 487 samples were collected from altitudes ranging from 645 to 5238 m above sea level. Information collected at each site included location, altitude, oxygen concentration, barometric pressure, and air temperature.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在青藏高原及其周边地区进行了实地观察，收集了487个样本，海拔范围从645米到5238米。每个地点收集的信息包括位置、海拔、氧气浓度、气压和气温。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze how variations in altitude, temperature, and vegetation impact surface oxygen concentrations based on observational data.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析海拔、温度和植被的变化如何影响地表氧气浓度，基于观测数据。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The analysis using the Lindeman, Merenda, and Gold (LMG) method estimated that altitude accounts for 47%, air temperature for 32%, and vegetation index (Fractional Vegetation Cover, FVC and Leaf Area Index, LAI) for 3% (FVC, R2 = 82%); 45%, 30%, and 7% (LAI, R2 = 82%) of the variation in oxygen concentration, respectively.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 使用Lindeman、Merenda和Gold（LMG）方法的分析估计，海拔占氧气浓度变化的47%，空气温度占32%，植被指数（植被覆盖度FVC和叶面积指数LAI）占3%（FVC，R2 = 82%）；LAI占45%、30%和7%（LAI，R2 = 82%）。
